comments:
This is in an AspectJ project. I've zipped up the two related projects in the hopes it helps in recreating the error. The other dependencies are on standard libraries that are relatively big so I didn't want to upload those as an attachment.

Sorry the file is too big for bugzilla. Maybe take a look at the stack trace to see if you need me to narrow it down or to send the project file offline.

Ron, which element do you perform the refactoring on to recreate the error? Is it consistent? I have the two project, but there are so many errors it's not clear which libraries I need. Can you narrow the problem down, or send me the libs?

The refactoring I perform is "Use Supertype Where Possible..." on CompositePerfStats. Sorry I lost the comment with the failed upload.

I will email you the relevant libraries so the project works for you offline.
I've now got the projects building without errors, but I still can't reproduce this. Please reopen if it happens again.
